    • Field Detail

      • WIDTH

        public static final int WIDTH
        WIDTH, HEIGHT : state of the blocks to be spawned. NUM : Max number of blocks that can be spawned in a scene. SLEEPMIL : Time for which Thread should stop running for each block that is reduced in snake length (if BLOCK_WEIGHT > 5); BLOCK_SPEED : Defines the speed of downward transition of the block.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HEIGHT

        public static final int HEIGHT
        WIDTH, HEIGHT : state of the blocks to be spawned. NUM : Max number of blocks that can be spawned in a scene. SLEEPMIL : Time for which Thread should stop running for each block that is reduced in snake length (if BLOCK_WEIGHT > 5); BLOCK_SPEED : Defines the speed of downward transition of the block.

      • _oneBlockGroup

        private javafx.scene.Group _oneBlockGroup
        _oneBlockGroup : First group of blocks that translate to bottom. _anotherBlockGroup : Second groups of blocks that translate to bottom. _oneBlockStack : Stack of first group of blocks. Contains information of each block in group. _anotherBlockStack : Stack of second group of blocks. Contains information of each block in group. _collision : boolean variable that checks for collision between block and snake _snakeRef : Stores reference to snake object from the game.

      • _anotherBlockGroup

        private javafx.scene.Group _anotherBlockGroup
        _oneBlockGroup : First group of blocks that translate to bottom. _anotherBlockGroup : Second groups of blocks that translate to bottom. _oneBlockStack : Stack of first group of blocks. Contains information of each block in group. _anotherBlockStack : Stack of second group of blocks. Contains information of each block in group. _collision : boolean variable that checks for collision between block and snake _snakeRef : Stores reference to snake object from the game.

      • Blocks

        public Blocks​()

      • Blocks

        public Blocks​(Snake snake,
              javafx.scene.Scene scene)
        Initializes block groups amd adds them to scene. Starts their animation
        Parameters:
        snake - Reference of snake object from game play
        scene - Reference of game play scene

    • Method Detail

      • makeBlock

        private javafx.scene.layout.StackPane makeBlock​(int weight,
                                                int xCoord)
        Makes a stack pane to link the block with its weight and xCoordinate
        Parameters:
        weight - Initial weight of block to be created. Weight = 0 - No block required in that position.
        xCoord - Horizontal position of block on screen.
        Returns:
        StackPane of Block

      • initBlocks

        private javafx.scene.Group initBlocks​(javafx.scene.Group rootScene,
                                      int x,
                                      int y,
                                      java.lang.String from)
        Initializes group of blocks with random weights. Maximum possible weight has been defined.
        Parameters:
        rootScene - All blocks are added to this group which is added to scene.
        x - Initializes the x coordinate of block group ( = 0)
        y - Initalizes the y coordinate of block group. Different for both block groups.
        from - ( = 1 when oneBlockGroup else anotherBlockGroup)
        Returns:
        Returns a group of blocks

      • animateBlocks

        private void animateBlocks​(javafx.scene.Group rootSceneGroup)
        Repeats code inside animation timer to start second group animation
        Parameters:
        rootSceneGroup - Passes the group where blocks need to be initialized,

      • moveBlockGroup

        private void moveBlockGroup​(javafx.scene.Group blockGroup)
        Translates group of blocks from top to bottom of screen. TODO : Check block speed/5. can cause trouble if block speed is increased.
        Parameters:
        blockGroup - Group of blocks that are being translated

      • checkCollisionWithSnake

        public void checkCollisionWithSnake​(int blockNumber,
                                    double x)
        Checks for collision between block and snake
        Parameters:
        blockNumber - block inside group (1 to 5) with which collision occurs.
        x - x coordinate of snake

      • setCollisionWithSnake

        public void setCollisionWithSnake​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane stack,
                                  java.lang.String by,
                                  int pos)
        Handles collision between block and snake.
        Parameters:
        stack - Reference to Stack of blocks
        by - Checks th group of blocks which collied with snake ( one - _oenBlockGroup, else - anotherBlockGroup)
        pos - position ( block number inside stack with which collision occurs. )
